structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.catch_line: Employees of county or city boards or commissions -- Compensation.
law.text: Any county or city board or commission, or combined city-county board or commission, which now has authority by law to fix the compensation of its employees, either with or without statutory limits, shall have power to fix the compensation of its employees subject only to the limitations contained in KRS 64.480 to 64.740.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 27, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 17.
